text.text: The Company has conducted a 7,000m drill program at Graal, targeting the Bouguer Anomaly. The company is seeking to identify significant amounts of nickel-copper-sulphide mineralization at the base of the magmatic chamber.

Early-stage drill results have been excellent. Initial drilling intersected massive sulphides with XRF point data taken on the sulphides in the core ranging up to 2.79% nickel and 25.68% copper. Lab results are pending.
